title: 'Coaching'
body:
Hi everyone,

I'm interested in spectating your games and giving you feedback on your gameplay. I think this would be interesting for me to see if I can pick up on other peoples mistakes and improve but also help other summoners :) Let me know if you're interested!

replies.body: I would be interested :) How much do you know about Jungle and Evelynn (because I'm a one-trick)? Also, you haven't specified the cost.

Hi :) I have a few replays that could do with being watched (two Evelynn game (1W 1L); one Soraka game (1L)). Two of them I lost because I couldn't use my lead, and the one I did win probably had silly mistakes. How would I send them to you? I sent you a friend request (IGN: Percival9).

> [{quoted}](name=Main Line,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=oEbP6wA5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-29T11:54:17.598+0000)

No? I haven't considered that ... 

I just wanted to spectate fellow summoners games (with their permission) and give them some feedback :) 
Like I said, this will help me improve as a player and hopefully, I can give useful information to the person I'm 'coaching'.

Yeah I wish the new client allowed us to spectate the people on the Challenger list that were in-game, like the old client did. They need to put that feature back. Not necessarily the part where it is on the front page, but just the ability to right-click on a player in game and select 'spectate'. There's only so many Challenger people on a low elo player's friend list :) Plus this feature improves the region as a whole, because analysts can put in work away from scrim reviews.

"The gap is increasing" is due to a small combination of factors that have really hurt the western regions. Dynamic queue and not being able to spectate are two key factors that have resulted in Korean teams increasing their lead on the rest of the world. It's time to put the skill back into the game for the other regions.
When you right-click on their names, "spectate" does pop up, but you can't select it. It's probably going to come back.
Yeah they used to have a small 'eye' icon to spectate them. Anyways I gave them some feedback on the client, so hopefully they read it.

I don't do vid/voice and I won't be playing for one or two weeks, but if you want you can spectate me when I'm available or I can give you my LoL replays from past games.

I'm a mid/top Anivia main (not quite 1-trick, but close)
